comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Clara Jane Bryant Ford, the wife of Industrialist Henry Ford I www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=8513421 In November 1915, she delivered a check for $ 10'000 to cover the expense of a telegraph canvass of all woman's societies to further mother's day and worlds peace to Jane Addams, president of the organization. The sun., November 23, 1915, Page 4, first column: "$ 10,000 FROM MRS. FORD" The bearer was Rebecca Shelley

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks B-59, we'll add her name to the catalog record.
